data.name: Innovacos Corp.
data.description:
Discover the Future of Beauty with Our Exclusive Cosmetic Ingredients!


Welcome to a new era in cosmetics, where innovation meets excellence. At Innovacos, we stay ahead of industry trends, continuously researching to provide solutions for all your formulation challenges.

Our mission is to design and manufacture pioneering cosmetic ingredients that empower formulators to create sophisticated, high-performing products. Our team of highly-trained chemists and cell biologists explores the benefits of unique biomasses from around the globe to ensure the best nature and science can offer.


Our Active and Formulience™ lines are designed for all cosmetic applications. These cutting-edge ingredients enhance skin health and appearance by targeting key biological mechanisms, while optimizing texture and functionality.


Why Choose Innovacos?


Innovative Research: We invest in continuous research to offer you the latest advancements in the cosmetics industry.

Global Sourcing: Our ingredients are sourced from unique biomasses around the world, ensuring exceptional quality and efficacy.

Expertise: Our experienced team develops ingredients that meet the highest standards of performance and safety.


Transform your formulations with our exclusive ingredients and create the future of beauty with Innovacos

data.name: PolyAquol
data.description:
The PolyAquol™ group includes patented technologies and represents a revolution in natural emulsifiers, offering solutions that combine exceptional performance and versatility. All PolyAquol™ products are COSMOS-approved


PolyAquol™-2W is a versatile O/W self-emulsifier that creates highly structured liquid crystals, essential for stability and skin compatibility. It prevents and repairs skin barrier damage, maintaining hydration and respecting the skin's microflora.


PolyAquol™-LW is an O/W emulsifier ideal for cold-process, low-viscosity emulsions. It excels in "one-pot" formulations and low-energy processes without heat or homogenization.


PolyAquol™-OS2 is a W/O self-emulsifier, perfect for creating light, cold-process emulsions with excellent dispersing abilities for pigments and powders, ideal for sun-care and makeup.


Finally, PolyAquol™-VO4 redefines emulsions by creating Water-and-Oil Fusion (W+O), offering excellent performance with vegetable oils and up to 80% internal water phase.


This makes PolyAquol™ the perfect choice for innovative, sustainable, high-performance formulations.

data.name: Bioptimized
data.description: Cellular senescence is the cause of the production of specific molecules known as the Senescence Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) factors “toxifying” the skin tissue environment thus accelerating the age-dependent tissue disorganization. The production of SASP factors is under the control of the synthesis regulator NFkB that is itself rapidly activated as cells become senescent. Bioptimized™ Guava is an active ingredient that inhibits the activation of NFkB and the production of SASP factors. Bioptimized™ Bioptimized™ Guava can be positioned as a Skin Aging Detox System™ and also The Skin Youth Element™. It is a key ingredient for all anti-aging formulations.

data.name: Liceryl
data.description: Liceryl™-12 is ester derived from linoleic and erucic fatty acids, respectively, and act as co-surfactants with emollient and solubilizing properties. It reduce skin erythema and skin barrier function disruption caused by surfactant penetration in the skin. Liceryl™-12 is synthesized with glycerin; an endogenous component of the skin known for its humectant properties. Linoleic acid is an unsaturated omega-6 fatty acid (18:2 -6) and prevalent in soybean oil (Glycine max). Erucic acid is a monounsaturated omega-9 fatty acid (22:1 -9) found in rapeseed oil (Brassica napus).

data.name: Activoil
data.description:
Activoil™ brings together three innovative oil-soluble and palm oil-free active ingredients, designed for cutting-edge natural formulations for skin and hair.


Activoil™ Kerox-Pro™ is a breakthrough solution for hair health, strengthening and protecting from damage caused by styling tools and UV exposure. Derived from Raphanus sativus seed and Magnolia extract, enriched with honokiol through CO₂ supercritical fluid extraction, it boosts antioxidant power, shine, elasticity, and prevents color fading, delivering vibrant, resilient hair.


Activoil™ Spotless ZRO is the ultimate ingredient for bright, flawless skin. Combining the power of blackcurrant seed oil and Paeonia extract, it preserves luminescence, reduces age spots, evens out skin tone, and prevents new spots from forming, leaving the skin radiant and youthful.


Activoil™ Echnidium ZRO offers deep protection and repair for sensitive skin. Containing echium seed oil and Cnidium monnieri extract, it shields the skin from environmental stress and chemical irritants while boosting hydration. Ideal for soothing and strengthening, it’s perfect for sensitive skincare and restorative formulations.

data.name: Regenesea
data.description: Regenesea™-LS is an active ingredient extracted from the algae Laminaria saccharina. This marine algae is exposed to extreme cold conditions along Canadian coasts where it is harvested. Such environmental conditions endow the marine algae with biological properties concentrated in the active ingredient Regenesea™-LS.

data.name: innollient
data.description:
The Innollient™ group offers a revolutionary range of COSMOS-approved natural emollients, providing cutting-edge solutions that combine exceptional performance and unique sensory experiences.


Innollient™ SB is an innovative sensory butter that exceeds the expectations of classic emollients; thanks to its exclusive structure, it creates an immediate protective barrier, accelerating skin recovery and soothing redness caused by mechanical stress, ensuring lasting results.


Innollient™ LO boasts extraordinary dispersing capabilities for pigments and inorganic UV filters and is the perfect natural alternative to silicones, as it offers a silky sensation and prolonged hydration.


Finally, Innollient™ SL completes the range as a rich dermo-emollient, perfect for nourishing formulations that provide superior softness and high spreadability.


This combination makes the Innollient™ group the ideal choice for innovative skincare products that meet the needs of modern consumers.

data.name: GinsenoLite
data.description: GinsenoLite™ is an active ingredient derived from Korean ginseng enriched the bioactive components ginsenosides. Ginsenosides possess a structure similar to that of plant polyphenols. GinsenoLite™ is standardized based on the content of ginsenosides. GinsenoLite™ is an active ingredient prevents skin melanocytes from producing and accumulating melanin pigments and was clinically shown to improve skin whitening.

data.name: Plant C-Stem

properties.name: INCI Name
items: Phaseolus Radiatus Meristem Cell Culture Extract

data.description:
Plant C-Stem™ includes two revolutionary water-soluble active ingredients developed through an innovative and patented cold-extraction method. This method allows the extraction of powerful bioactive components stored in the vacuoles and avoids the use of solvents, enzymes, or high temperatures, preserving their full biological potential and ensuring maximum effectiveness.


Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata demonstrates extraordinary reparative properties, particularly effective on sun-damaged skin, reducing irritation and combating photo-aging caused by chronic sun exposure. With its broad-spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, infrared, and blue light, and an SPF-boosting effect, it is the ideal active ingredient for advanced suncare formulations, offering a complete solution for skin protection and repair.


Plant C-Stem™ Bamboo, rich in silicon, an essential component for maintaining hair health and beauty, promotes collagen production, helping to keep hair strong, healthy, and resilient. It can also be used in treatments for lashes and brows, providing a healthier, longer, and thicker appearance. This water-soluble ingredient is compatible with glycerin and propylene glycol, making it ideal for a wide range of haircare formulations. The Plant C-Stem™ extraction method provides formulators with unique, natural ingredients, preserving their full biological potential of the plant.

data.name: Eceryl
data.description: Eceryl™ 12 is ester derived from linoleic and erucic fatty acids, respectively, and act as co-surfactants with emollient and solubilizing properties. It reduce skin erythema and skin barrier function disruption caused by surfactant penetration in the skin. Eceryl™ 12 is synthesized with glycerin; an endogenous component of the skin known for its humectant properties. Linoleic acid is an unsaturated omega-6 fatty acid (18:2 -6) and prevalent in soybean oil (Glycine max). Erucic acid is a monounsaturated omega-9 fatty acid (22:1 -9) found in rapeseed oil (Brassica napus).

data.name: innollient™ SL

properties.name: Benefit Claims
items: Prevention Of Surfactant-Induced Damages To The Skin Barrier Function

data.description:
Innollient™ SL is a rich, buttery dermo-emollient, ideal for nourishing formulations that provide superior smoothness to the skin. More nourishing than jojoba oil, this product enhances hydration, visibly improving skin elasticity and resilience, adding an innovative and luxurious touch to creams and skincare products. Primarily composed of vegetable fatty acids, Innollient™ SL creates hydrophilic pockets that interact with water molecules through hydrogen bonding. Thanks to its distinctive structure, it boasts excellent film-forming properties, making it ideal for formulations that aim for long-lasting results and extended comfort.

The main benefits of Innollient™ SL include outstanding film-forming action and unique emollient capacity, combined with a significant improvement in the skin barrier function. It boosts hydration and skin resilience, reducing TEWL, with high spreadability and a pleasantly soft sensation. Perfect for modern formulations, it offers a rich sensorial experience and long-lasting effects.

data.name: Activoil™ Spotless ZRO
data.description:
Activoil™ Spotless ZRO is a 100% oil-soluble active ingredient specifically formulated to enhance skin radiance and lightening while effectively reducing the appearance of age spots and preventing their formation. This stabilized lipophilic complex combines the potent benefits of blackcurrant seed oil, rich in Omega 6-3-6 fatty acids, and Paeonia extract, rich in paeonol, renowned for its anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and anti-melanogenic properties.

The blackcurrant seed oil, rich in biologically active fatty acids such as linoleic acid, works by inhibiting melanogenesis at the tyrosinase level, thereby reducing age spots and promoting a more even skin tone. The Paeonia extract, derived from the "King of Flowers" and widely used in Traditional Asian Medicine, enhances the skin’s natural brightness and helps prevent UV-induced skin redness.

In comparison with blackcurrant seed oil, Activoil™ Spotless ZRO displays an oxidative stability of more than 170-fold when exposed to extreme oxidative conditions. This innovative combination provides long-term improvement in skin luminescence and offers a comprehensive solution for advanced skin lightening and anti-aging formulations.

Ideal for anti-aging, skin lightening products, and functional makeup, Activoil™ Spotless ZRO is the perfect choice for formulations targeting dyschromia, preventing sunspots, and promoting radiant, youthful skin.

data.name: Bioptimized™ Guava
data.description:
Bioptimized™ Guava is an exclusive anti-aging active ingredient derived from the bio-fermentation of Guava leaves, sustainably cultivated on farms on Jeju Island, South Korea, and biologically optimized with Saccharomyces lysate to enhance its biological properties. This unique biotechnology ingredient outperforms traditional Guava leaf extracts by acting on multiple pathways involved in skin cell senescence.


It works by blocking the activation of NFkB, the main regulator of inflammation, and, as a result, blocking the main inflammatory pathways. Bioptimized™ Guava inhibits the production of pro-inflammatory SASP factors, protecting the skin from inflammation and providing comprehensive protection against premature aging. It can be used as the main ingredient for a powerful anti-aging action or as a booster in combination with traditional anti-aging actives to enhance their efficacy.


Thanks to its powerful action, Bioptimized™ Guava targets cellular senescence and is a key ingredient for skincare products designed to prevent the appearance of aging signs and protect against inflamm-aging.

data.name: Regenesea™ LS
data.description:
Regenesea™ LS is a powerful anti-aging ingredient derived from Laminaria saccharina, a unique marine algae sustainably harvested in the cold, pure waters off the Canadian coast. Growing in these extreme conditions, this algae develops exceptional biological properties, all concentrated in Regenesea™ LS to provide deep and comprehensive protection against visible signs of aging.


What makes Regenesea™ LS innovative is its ability to reverse the signs of aging by boosting the expression of key proteins involved in cellular rejuvenation. This cutting-edge ingredient not only protects the skin but actively works to turn back the clock, leaving it smoother, firmer, and more youthful. Ideal for formulators seeking to create advanced skincare products, Regenesea™ LS offers a natural, proven solution for visible and long-lasting age reversal.

data.name: innollient™ LO

properties.name: Benefit Claims
items: Prevention Of Surfactant-Induced Damages To The Skin Barrier Function

data.description: Innollient™ LO, a liquid estolide primarily composed of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids, designed to enhance cosmetic formulations. Its unique structure, enriched with a Guerbet derivative, has a high affinity for water molecules and offers superior fluidity and spreadability with a low-friction feel on the skin. It also provides excellent dispersing capabilities for pigments and inorganic UV filters. Innollient™ LO is an ideal natural alternative to silicone, combining exceptional sensory properties with long-lasting hydration, perfect for innovative skincare products.

data.name: Activoil™ Echnidium ZRO
data.description:
Activoil™ Echnidium ZRO is a stabilized, oil-soluble active ingredient specifically designed to protect and repair the skin from environmental and chemical damages. Formulated with three key components: echium seed oil, a rare and rich source of stearidonic acid, combined with a potent antioxidant and Cnidium monnieri extract, this ingredient offers comprehensive protection against stressors like PM2.5, surfactants, and ethanol.


Thanks to its unique lipophilic nature, Activoil™ Echnidium ZRO deeply penetrates the skin layers, effectively repairing and reinforcing the skin barrier, while preventing irritation and sensitivity caused by exposure to aggressive chemicals. This advanced active doesn’t just form a physical barrier, it enhances the skin’s physiological defenses, making it more resilient and stronger over time. Activoil™ Echnidium ZRO is the ideal choice for products targeting sensitive skin, functional makeup, and sanitizing solutions (as it helps prevent ethanol-induced dehydration while boosting hydration over time).

Its stabilized and ready-to-use format ensures consistent and clinically proven efficacy, making it an essential ingredient for innovative formulations that aim to provide protection and repair in a single solution.

data.name: PolyAquol™ LW
data.description: PolyAquol™-LW, a patented, naturally derived polyglycerol-based O/W emulsifier that redefines emulsification processes. This innovative emulsifier excels at forming low-viscosity emulsions in cold-process environments, making it ideal for "one-pot" formulations and low-energy processes that don't require heat or homogenization. Whether incorporated in the water or oil phase, PolyAquol™-LW offers unmatched versatility. With Cosmos certification and palm-free origin, it’s the perfect choice for green formulations. Thanks to its advanced molecular design, it surpasses emulsifiers with similar chemical compositions in performance and stability.

data.name: PolyAquol™ VO4
data.description: PolyAquol™-VO4 is an innovative, patented technology that redefines emulsions by creating a true Water-and-Oil Fusion (W+O). This 100% natural, Cosmos-certified, palm-free emulsifier, derived from polyglyceryl and oleic acid derivatives, performs exceptionally well even with 100% vegetable oils. PolyAquol™-VO4 enables the creation of cold-process emulsions with up to 80% internal water phase, providing unmatched control over viscosity. At low concentrations, it ensures stable, high-performance emulsions with luxurious sensory properties, surpassing competitors in both robustness and sensory experience, making it the perfect choice for innovative and sustainable cosmetic formulations.

data.name: PolyAquol™ OS2
data.description: PolyAquol™-OS2, a patented, naturally derived W/O polyglycerol self-emulsifier, perfect for creating cold-processed emulsions with a light texture and pleasant skin feel. Certified by Ecocert and Cosmos, it ensures high natural standards. PolyAquol™-OS2 is compatible with silicone derivatives and boosts the performance of other emulsifiers. Its excellent dispersing abilities for powders and pigments make it ideal for sun-care and makeup formulations. Whether you're formulating sunscreens or cosmetics, PolyAquol™-OS2 provides superior stability and texture, ensuring your products meet both performance and natural ingredient demands.

data.name: Plant C-Stem
data.html_description:
Plant C-Stem™ includes two revolutionary water-soluble active ingredients developed through an innovative and patented cold-extraction method. This method allows the extraction of powerful bioactive components stored in the vacuoles and avoids the use of solvents, enzymes, or high temperatures, preserving their full biological potential and ensuring maximum effectiveness.


Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata demonstrates extraordinary reparative properties, particularly effective on sun-damaged skin, reducing irritation and combating photo-aging caused by chronic sun exposure. With its broad-spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, infrared, and blue light, and an SPF-boosting effect, it is the ideal active ingredient for advanced suncare formulations, offering a complete solution for skin protection and repair.


Plant C-Stem™ Bamboo, rich in silicon, an essential component for maintaining hair health and beauty, promotes collagen production, helping to keep hair strong, healthy, and resilient. It can also be used in treatments for lashes and brows, providing a healthier, longer, and thicker appearance. This water-soluble ingredient is compatible with glycerin and propylene glycol, making it ideal for a wide range of haircare formulations. The Plant C-Stem™ extraction method provides formulators with unique, natural ingredients, preserving their full biological potential of the plant.
data.text_description: Plant C-Stem™ Vigna radiata is an active ingredient that is a completely new concept of plant extraction. Plant cells contain a big vacuole they use as a warehouse to store bio-active components required for growth and repair. From plant cell cultures, we selectively extract the content of the intracellular vacuole without the use of solvent or enzyme. Using the plant cell vacuole extract as an active ingredient is like using the plant serum.
data.seo_description: View all Innovacos Corp. Plant C-Stem products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

filters.filter_name: Phaseolus Radiatus Meristem Cell Culture Extract

data.name: Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata

summary.name: INCI Name
items: Phaseolus Radiatus Meristem Cell Culture Extract

properties.name: INCI Name
items: Phaseolus Radiatus Meristem Cell Culture Extract

data.description:
Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata is a revolutionary water-soluble active ingredient, developed through an innovative cold-extraction method. This technology allows for the extraction of the powerful bioactive components stored in the vacuoles of Vigna radiata cells, a plant renowned for its exceptional resistance to environmental stress such as UV radiation, drought, and high salt concentrations. Thanks to Plant C-Stem™, an extraction method that avoids the use of solvents, enzymes, or high temperatures, the full biological potential of these components is preserved, ensuring maximum effectiveness.


The Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata extract demonstrates extraordinary reparative properties, particularly effective on sun-damaged skin, reducing irritation and combating photo-aging caused by chronic sun exposure. With its broad-spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, infrared, and blue light, and an SPF-boosting effect, Plant C-Stem™ Vigna Radiata is the ideal active ingredient for advanced suncare formulations, offering a complete solution for skin protection and repair.

data.name: Plant C-Stem™ Bamboo
data.description:
Plant C-Stem™Bamboo is a revolutionary water-soluble active ingredient, developed through an innovative cold-extraction method. This technology extracts the powerful bioactive components stored in the vacuoles of Phyllostachys pubescens, the giant bamboo known for its rapid growth and resilience. Rich in silicon (Si), an essential component for maintaining hair health and beauty, the extract promotes collagen production, helping to keep hair strong, healthy, and resilient.

Thanks to the innovative extraction process, Plant C-Stem™ captures the essential bioactive components from the plant vacuole without the use of solvents or enzymes, preserving the full potential of the extract. This water-soluble ingredient is compatible with glycerin and propylene glycol, making it ideal for a wide range of haircare formulations.

Designed to strengthen hair and reduce hair loss, Plant C-Stem™Bamboo is perfect for preventing seasonal hair loss, enhancing hair density, and providing a healthier, longer, and thicker appearance of lashes and brows. It offers a comprehensive solution for hair health, reducing hair loss, boosting density, and protecting hair from the effects of aging, making it the perfect choice for advanced haircare products aimed at strengthening and promoting hair growth.

ROW.TITLE: Knowde Software
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Use Knowde's software to power your internal business systems and drive growth.

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers
0.DESCRIPTION: Transform how customers discover, engage and transact with you online with turnkey solutions for ingredient, polymer and chemical suppliers.

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application
1.DESCRIPTION: Knowde's turnkey application enables you to deliver an incredible customer experience on your website and turns it into a growth tool for your sales team.

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace
2.DESCRIPTION: Join the fastest growing marketplace for ingredients, polymers and chemicals. Get started for free!

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
